content:
Glad to see that there's interest here! We're going to be doing a public beta in late summer, which means that any of you guys will be able to start testing out the product, free! Stay tuned.

And while portability to other OSes like Linux isn't one of our main priorities, it's something we are going to look at down the road. You never know what might happen.

title: Re: Better than MMF2
content:
I must say, I'm impressed. There's literally tons of features and options to play with, this is a really powerful tool. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-smile.gif[/img] They're really working their asses off to fix and add everything: the second beta release is out today already, while the first release was only yesterday!

The effects in this program are really good. Lens effects etcetera look great. The event editor is more organized, it's easier to oversee the actions (not a bunch of checkboxes but instead a line of text describing the action), and the whole program works a lot more efficient than MMF.

I recommend Clickers to go and try out this program and try to get used to it. Seriously. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-smile.gif[/img] ____________
Don't think of me as an ordinary man.
